edge: Anil Sharma is the director of Gadar: Ek Prem Katha.
Sunny Deol plays a lead role in Gadar: Ek Prem Katha.
Kajol was offered the role of Sakeena in Gadar: Ek Prem Katha, but she declined.
A part of Gadar: Ek Prem Katha was shot at Bishop Cotton School in Shimla.
A part of Gadar: Ek Prem Katha was shot at Sacred Heart Senior Secondary School at Dalhousie.
The city of Lucknow is depicted as Lahore, Pakistan in Gadar: Ek Prem Katha and some parts were shot there.
Some parts of Gadar: Ek Prem Katha were shot at Irshad Manzil Palace in Rudauli.
A significant part of Gadar: Ek Prem Katha was shot in Pathankot to depict the division-torn country.
A significant part of Gadar: Ek Prem Katha was shot in Sarna to depict the division-torn country.
A significant part of Gadar: Ek Prem Katha was shot in Amritsar to depict the division-torn country.
The movie Gadar: Ek Prem Katha is set in 1947.
The music of 'Que sera sera' which was first published in 1956 is featured in Gadar: Ek Prem Katha despite the movie being set in 1947.
